name: Keep The Meter Running!
description:
How to play:

The game requires a minimum of 2 players with a maximum of 4. Each player must press a corresponding key on the keyboard (W, U, ArrowUp or 8 key) to control one of the four available taxi cabs.

Pick up passengers and drive them to their color coded destination! Compete with up to three other drivers for the highest possible tariff before time runs out! Avoid their powerful attacks aimed at sabotaging your ride and stealing your fare! And don’t forget, keep the meter running!

Created by the Holy Team for the Admix Game Jam 22-24 April 2022

Development:

Andrew Xeroudakis

Tasos Saridakis

Chris Constantinou

George Pagkalis

Artists:

Rea Papadopetrou

Mario Tsota

Music by Bensound (https://www.bensound.com/)

SFX from Freesound.org (https://freesound.org/)
